column1: Lankwitz  is a German locality (Ortsteil) within the borough (Bezirk) of Steglitz-Zehlendorf
column2: Berlin. Until 2001 it was part of the former borough of Steglitz.

column1: The locality was first mentioned in 1239 with the name of Lankowice. Autonomous Prussian municipality of the former Teltow district
column2: Lankwitz was incorporated into Berlin in 1920
